The mechanisms by which <extra_id_0> GATA-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> controls cell survival are unknown .

Here we report that in erythroid cells , <extra_id_0> GATA-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> strongly induces the expression of the anti-apoptotic protein <extra_id_0> bcl-xL <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , but not the related proteins <extra_id_0> bcl-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> mcl-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
